summary: When a woman visits a Chinese doctor, she discovers her pain is due to pent-up rage, and the only cure is to fully express herself, whatever may come.
cast: Paz Bascuñán|Antonio Quercia|Paulo Brunetti|Lucy Cominetti|Ignacia Allamand|Ariel Levy|Alison Mandel|Carolina Paulsen|Ramón Llao|Nicolás Durán|Bonnie Ramírez|Nick Bolt|Luis Pablo Román|Nacho Pop|Alberto Alén|Francisco Ortega|Antonia Zegers|Álvaro López Álvarez|Igal Furman|Jaime Flores|Steffi Lutz
keywords: rage versus calm|self control|horrible boss|generation gap|personal growth
title: Sin Filtro
